name: Project Failure (valérieXYZ)
description:
This is a small game I made as part of a project. The aim of the project was to create a platformer where falling would send you completely to the beginning, and it's heavily inspired by Jump King. Most of the work was done in July of 2021.

It's quite buggy. Like the way the slopes work is genuinely goofy. At one point I'd hoped to come back to it and fix it, but really I think it's better left as a relic of the past. This is also where I'd ask you to contact me if you find any skips or instances of falling not sending you to the beginning if it were being updated. Also, to be honest, I genuinely don't know if I have access to the latest version of the source code anymore, so...

If anyone's interested, this was made in GMS2, written completely in GML.
